reference.description: bz#1757214: CVE-2019-16884 runc: AppArmor/SELinux bypass with malicious image that specifies a volume at /proc

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note: Updated runc package that fixes several bugs is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Extras.

The runc tool is a lightweight, portable implementation of the Open Container Format (OCF) that provides container runtime.
Users of runc are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which fixes several bugs.
